      • close

      • rumble

        public boolean rumble(float leftMagnitude,
                      float rightMagnitude,
                      int duration_ms)
        Vibrate the controller using the new rumble API This will return false if the controller doesn't support vibration or if SDL was unable to start vibration (maybe the controller doesn't support left/right vibration, maybe it was unplugged in the middle of trying, etc...)
        Specified by:
        rumble in interface RumbleController
        Parameters:
        leftMagnitude - The speed for the left motor to vibrate (this should be between 0 and 1)
        rightMagnitude - The speed for the right motor to vibrate (this should be between 0 and 1)
        Returns:
        Whether or not the controller was able to be vibrated (i.e. if rumble is supported)
